sentences.en: Alice's girlfriends were green with envy when they saw her new dress.
sentences.cn: 爱丽丝的女友们看到她的新衣服很妒忌.

sentences.en: Britain is now the envy of the world's record companies.
sentences.cn: 英国现在是全世界唱片公司羡慕的对象。

sentences.en: Could there have been a slight tinge of envy in Eva's voice?
sentences.cn: 伊娃的声音里可能会有一丝羡慕吗？

sentences.en: Glover thinks that Smith did him down, perhaps out of envy.
sentences.cn: 格洛弗认为史密斯说他坏话，也许是出于嫉妒。

sentences.en: Gradually he began to acknowledge his feelings of envy towards his mother.
sentences.cn: 渐渐地，他开始承认自己羡慕母亲。

sentences.en: He couldn't conceal his envy of me.
sentences.cn: 他掩饰不住对我的忌妒。

sentences.en: I don't envy your journey in this bad weather.
sentences.cn: 我并不羡慕你在这样恶劣的天气里旅行.

sentences.en: I felt a twinge of envy for the people who lived there.
sentences.cn: 我对住在那儿的人产生过一阵嫉妒.

sentences.en: I really envy you and Ian, you seem so happy together.
sentences.cn: 我真是羡慕你和伊恩，你俩在一起看起来多幸福。

sentences.en: I was filled with envy at their adventurous lifestyle.
sentences.cn: 我很羨慕他们敢于冒险的生活方式.

sentences.en: Klein's most important work is called "Envy and Gratitude"
sentences.cn: 克莱因最重要的著作名为《嫉妒与感激》。

sentences.en: Maybe there is jealousy, but I think the envy is more powerful.
sentences.cn: 也许是羡慕，但我认为更多的是嫉妒。

sentences.en: She could see that all the other girls were green with envy(= feeling a lot of envy ).
sentences.cn: 她看得出其他女孩都很眼红。

sentences.en: She has a lifestyle which most people would envy.
sentences.cn: 她的生活方式会令大多数人感到羡慕。

sentences.en: She was caught between envy and admiration.
sentences.cn: 她不知是该妒忌还是该羡慕。

sentences.en: They enjoyed an income and lifestyle that many people would envy.
sentences.cn: 他们的收入和生活方式会令很多人都羡慕不已。

sentences.en: They were full of envy when they saw my new car.
sentences.cn: 他们看了我的新汽车,都非常羡慕.

sentences.en: Unconscious envy manifests itself very often as this kind of arrogance.
sentences.cn: 潜意识里的嫉妒常表现为这种傲慢自大。

words.tran_cn: 值得羡慕的；引起忌妒的

trans.tran_en: the feeling of wanting something that someone else has
to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
to wish that you had someone else’s possessions, abilities etc
